descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: Grip colors black and white

Another re-texture for the basic steel sword with a bit more dazzle. I use this with Epic Skyforge Steel Weapons -mod (by rage0976) so that it applies only for the skyforged steel sword which is my weapon-of-choise in the game.

INSTALL (changes the basic steel sword texture)
Just add the desired texture into your textures folder (..\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons\\Steel) 

Don\'t have a textures folder? No worries just create one! but remember to create the sub folders too.

INSTALL (with epic skyforge steel weapons -mod)
If you use the epic skyforge steel weapons -mod  put it into ..\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons\\SkyforgeSteel

Hope you like it, endorse if you do!
author: MonkeyOnJET
